description: This walk explores the Capability Brown landscaped grounds surrounding this Georgian Mansion in Warwickshire. There's good footpaths taking you around 120 acres of parkland, gardens, artistic sculptures and lakes. You can pay for access to the grounds and house or follow public footpaths and bridleways running around the edge of the estate. Other features include an award winning art galleries, a gift shop and some impressive redwoods in the park.
